title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official CLI and server for running large language models locally (Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc.) with a simple API and Docker support.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama server; install via npm as ‘ollama’.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; pip install ollama.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package letting you use Ollama models as LLM or embeddings in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model management, multi-user, dark mode).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Terminal UI client for Ollama written in Python; supports interactive chat and model switching.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub Copilot-style VS Code extension that uses local Ollama models for inline suggestions.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama; available on Maven Central.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; gem install ollama.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Next.js chat interface for Ollama with Markdown support and responsive design.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset to use Ollama models in RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET client for Ollama; NuGet package Ollama.

title: ollama-kotlin
summary: Kotlin multiplatform HTTP client for Ollama; JVM & Android targets.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module for CI/CD pipelines that spin up Ollama containers for testing.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate for Ollama; crates.io name ollama-rs.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM prompts via Ollama inside your notes.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Lightweight Slack bot that forwards channel messages to an Ollama model and replies.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client for Ollama; go get github.com/ollama/ollama/go.
